detectors.description:
Reentrancy in TTGoldPolicy.rebase() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/TTGoldPolicy.sol#378-394):
	External calls:
	- supplyAfterRebase = tt.rebaseGold(epoch,supplyDelta) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/TTGoldPolicy.sol#390)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- LogRebase(epoch,marketPrice,curGoldPrice,supplyDelta,now) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/TTGoldPolicy.sol#393)

detectors.description:
TTGoldPolicy.canRebase() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/TTGoldPolicy.sol#370-372) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- (lastRebaseTimestampSec.add(minRebaseTimeIntervalSec) < now) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/TTGoldPolicy.sol#371)

detectors.description: Pragma version^0.6.12 (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/TTGoldPolicy.sol#17) necessitates a version too recent to be trusted. Consider deploying with 0.6.11
